title: Coinbase’s Layer-2 solution, Base, gains massive traction with 136K daily users
description: The number of daily active users on Coinbase’s layer 2 blockchain has surpassed 100,000 for the first time, just one day after the network’s formal launch. Base was officially launched after a few weeks in an “open for builders only” phase. According to an announcement made by the team on August 9, the network is ... Read more

title: Libbitcoin vulnerability leads to $900k theft from Bitcoin wallets
description: A vulnerability in the Libbitcoin Explorer 3.x library has led to the theft of over $900,000 from Bitcoin users. Blockchain security firm SlowMist reported the issue. It could also affect users of other digital currencies like Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP),…
